79411.summary: Some customers in the Okanagan Landing area of Vernon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79411.title: June 30 - Vernon (Okanagan Landing) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
